description: This file is an ESLint configuration module that sets linting rules and plugin configurations for JavaScript and JSX files in a frontend project. It imports plugins for JavaScript and React, and exports an array of configuration objects that specify parser options, global variables, and rules to enforce coding standards, including React-specific rules.

methods.name: default
methods.description: Exports an array of ESLint configuration objects setting rules, parser options, and plugin configurations for JavaScript and React files.
